name: Pub Crawl
description: I made this game on my second year of uni, this was our first assignment, I hope you all like it, if anyone needs any help on finishing it, let me know. If you want to end the pub crawl, just type in "win", also, make sure to hit escape rather than enter to commit the text, the reason for this was that this was originally made for mobile, so you can also touch or click the screen to commit.
